name: Soul Interface
storyline:
This game is a virtual aquarium \ petri dish.
Pick whichever description speaks to your <3:

1. You get to design virtual lifeforms - their bodies, nervous cells, muscle fibers.
Train their AI, carry out experiments in a 3D physics simulation, in real time, on your PC.
If they then survive in a shared environment, amongst species made by other players,
Your organisms get to spread to thousands of other singleplayer worlds...and you get a cut of everything they eat!

2. You are tasked with growing and developing a virtual ecosystem.
You will create safe, warm currents to grow digital jellyfish,
Architect growbeds for virtual seaweed, safe hunting grounds for baby sharks,
Select species of plants and predators that coexist well together...watch your digital ecosystem flourish!

Oh, and every process \ mechanic is physically represented - you need to fly through
space to explore multiplayer, send spacecraft carrying your organisms' genetic material
to infect other players with it, seek energy sources to power your experiments...
summary: This game is a virtual aquarium \ petri dish. Grow \ design virtual lifeforms, experiment, watch them compete for survival in a shared environment, spread them across space to other singleplayer worlds....<3
